channel.title: Futurestack on Casey Becking
channel.description: Recent content in Futurestack on Casey Becking

item.title: Future Stack 2016
item.description: Why did I goto FutureStack 2016? Rackspace prides itself on having the most educated engineers in the industry and being able to send specific engineers to conferences is a large value add for Rackspace as a whole. This is why I was able to attend the new relic future stack 2016 conference in San Francisco. Today I’m going to go over a few of the key takeaways from the conference and how they will be able to be used immediately within our clients infrastructure and application.
